orxSTRUCTURE_ID {...}{.size: 4.} = enum
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMPOINTER = 0, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_BODY, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CLOCK,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FRAME, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FXPOINTER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_GRAPHIC,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SHADERPOINTER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUNDPOINTER,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SPAWNER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TIMELINE,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_LINKABLE_NUMBER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_ANIMSET,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_CAMERA, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FONT, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_FX,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_OBJECT, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SHADER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_SOUND,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXT, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_TEXTURE, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_VIEWPORT,
  orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NUMBER, orxSTRUCTURE_ID_NONE = 4294967295
